restrooms.name: 125th St. Subway Station
restrooms.address: 125th between St. Nicholas Ave & Frederick Douglass Blvd.

comments.author: Thor
comments.content: Super clean so huge respecto to the people who workt there

comments.author: Dr. Rachel Smerd
comments.content: Definitely didn't expect a public restroom to be so clean, so sleek and so classy in the heart of NYC. Flowers, arts, marbles, and classical/soothing music plays in the restroom...

comments.author: Sean Penn
comments.content: WHEN YOU GOTTA GO, YOU GOTTA GO

comments.author: Sir LanceAlot
comments.content: it's usually locked but saved me from some embarrassment

comments.author: Malcolm Runganga
comments.content: never have any toilet paper

comments.author: Joexzilla
comments.content: no real place to hold my mcflurry by the sink.

comments.author: Amelia G
comments.content: Nice Whole Foods, and very big. Got me a nice rotisserie chicken on my way out of the bathroom.

comments.author: Roger Guan
comments.content: Really crowded inside, no limits on the number of people.

comments.author: Emani C.
comments.content: Bathrooms were clean! But I love whole foods to death but ever since Amazon has owned it the vegan cake options in the bakery have been taken away , and the coupon Amazon gives only takes off a tiny amount . The prices seem to have increased as well . I was a loyal customer to Whole Foods but if your gonna take away options for us vegans and leave us with the frozen dry expired dessert foods to survive off of I’ll take my money else where along with my friends and other family members who so happen to be vegan as well. It’s important to take all customers into consideration.

comments.author: Eric C.
comments.content: It's a great Starbucks considering the high density area it's in. The staff is incredibly efficient and polite, needed a code to get into the restroom.

comments.author: Jane Withers
comments.content: There's only one bathroom, which is fine sicne it's a small shop. FURMANS NOW SELLS PLANTS

comments.author: Dr. Rachel Smerd
comments.content: Restroom at my office was out of order.

comments.author: Mr. Han
comments.content: It was okay for a park restroom

comments.author: Jared
comments.content: ended up playing some ball after using their facilities. 5/5 will recommend

comments.author: Lily
comments.content: Always my go-to spot when I'm in the area!

comments.author: Stephanie Rogers
comments.content: I usually spend most of the day here. I have a small bladder so I frequent the toilet, attendants do a great job keeping it clean!

comments.author: Chansey
comments.content: beautiful area. well maintained restrooms throughout.

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: i am a tourist from sweden. it is very difficult to find restrooms in new york city! staff was very nice at new yorker hotel

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: a lot of pigeons here.

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: plenty of stalls

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: had to buy a cheeseburger to use the restroom. should have gotten the big mac though. icecream machine still broken

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: nice shop

comments.author: Anon
comments.content: 2 floors of bathrooms!
